data.name: eXpanSIM
data.detailed_description:
Early Beta Access

The simulator is now in a closed beta phase. You can download the current version and take part in the development by sharing your feedback. Follow the steps below:

  1. Apply for a free Steam key in this thread. The game will appear in your Steam library after the key is activated.
  2. Ask questions and discuss relevant topics on the official forum.
  3. Join our official Discord server to stay in touch with the developers.


About the Game



eXpanSIM is a universal vehicle simulator that supports VR and lets you:

  • train the technique of driving cars and trucks,
  • test your strength in competitive driving,
  • validate new solutions and conduct experimental research.

eXpanSIM aims to capture the realism of driving cars and trucks of different types (petrol, diesel, and electric). The game offers a range of different locations including urban environments, race tracks, and off-road routes. Driving in VR mode is optional.

The project is powered by an original vehicle physics engine designed for professional applications. It was developed by Raving Bots, a Polish indie studio.

Driving school


Improve your driving skills. Learn the principles of eco-driving and hone your driving technique. A range of specially designed training scenarios will lead you to perfection.

Racing


Prepare yourself for a high realism and an extreme level of difficulty. There will be no driving assistance systems (unless they exist in real vehicles). You've been warned.

Research testbed


Communicate with the simulation using a convenient API. Conduct a series of experiments and collect results easily. eXpanSIM is a modern tool for engineers, designers, Artificial Intelligence researchers working on autonomous vehicles and more.

Vehicles


Currently available vehicle types:

  • formula car,
  • muscle car,
  • limousine,
  • city car,
  • pickup,
  • van,
  • city bus,
  • intercity bus,
  • fire truck,
  • off-road truck,
  • lorry (with a semitrailer or a tanker),
  • haul truck,
  • dozer,
  • armoured personnel carrier (APC),
  • mobile gun system (MGS),
  • manoeuvre combat vehicle (MCV),
  • main battle tank (MBT).

Vehicle models have right-hand and left-hand traffic variants as well. We are constantly expanding the collection of available vehicles. In the near future, the drones will be added.

Equipment


To fully experience the potential of the simulator, it is recommended to use a steering wheel with pedals. The game supports popular VR equipment such as HTC Vive and Oculus Rift.

Work in progress


The project is currently in closed beta testing. Contact us if you would like to get access.

data.short_description: eXpanSIM is a universal vehicle simulator supporting VR. The training mode lets you learn (eco-)driving cars and trucks. Racing fans can test their skills in driving vehicles with realistic physics. It is also a modern research testbed for engineers, designers and AI specialists working on autonomous vehicles.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 @ 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 @ 3.4GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:
